description: This file defines an interface class IOmiProxy for interacting with an omi_dbus_api. It includes methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, as well as registering and unregistering error listeners, and it provides enums and typedefs related to error handling.

classes.name: omi::IOmiProxy
classes.description: An interface that provides methods for managing crypted bundles and error listeners for omi_dbus_api interactions.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, filesystem image path, config path, and outputs the decrypted configuration bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle based on its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered listener by its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
